questions.question: In the input characteristics of a common-emitter transistor, which region indicates the saturation?
What relationship between base current and collector current is typically observed in a common-emitter configuration?

answers.a: Base current is much higher than collector current
answers.b: Collector current is much higher than base current

questions.question: What happens to the output characteristics when the base current is increased?
Which parameter is kept constant while measuring the output characteristics of a transistor?
What does the slope of the output characteristic curve indicate?
